titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation publishing an act of state, and His Majesties command concerning a scandalous paper lately dispersed amongst many of his subjects.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Suppressing the distribution of a manuscript entitled "Some conditions of His Majesties treaty with his subjects of Scotland are set down here for remembrance".
Dated at end: Westminster the eleventh day of August, 1639. ...
Steele notation: Arms 23; much to 2) di- de-.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
